query: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, COUNT(r.id) as actualRideCount, COALESCE(SUM(r.distance), 0) as actualTotalDistance FROM scooters s LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON r.scooterId = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%' GROUP BY s.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT s.id, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, COUNT(r.id) as actualRideCount, COALESCE(SUM(r.distance), 0) as actualTotalDistance FROM scooters s LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON r.scooterId = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%' GROUP BY s.id;
